main.name: Hi there, I'm Haziq
main.description: I am a designer who codes. I use react.js and node.js to develop amazing websites. I am a certified MERN stack developer, and have sufficient experience in building both front-end and back-end sites
main.bio: I am a learner at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, and a passion for coding. Born in a small city in Gojra and currently studing copmuter science in Lahaore Pakistan. I started my journey in practical world by working as a freelance graphic designer in my college days, after a year I directed my focus to coding and developing and learned MERN stack web development from E-vantures solutions Lahore. I have completed several intersting projects during my experience working  with teams as well as independently.
main.contactmessage: For any queries or offers feel free to send an email or reach me on my social accounts.

education.description: Currently studing in one of well known universities in field of computer sciences in Pakistan

education.school: The Standard Group Of Colleges, Gojra Campus
education.description: Completed my college with A+ grades.
Learned full stack web development using HTML5, CSS, advanced es6 Javascript, ReactJs, Node Js, Mongo DB and Express. Completed Different projects as a front-end as well as a back-end developer.
